thread.title: Hard quiz alert! How quickly can you name the Champions League's 20 all-time top goalscorers?
thread.title_full: Hard quiz alert! How quickly can you name the Champions League's 20 all-time top goalscorers?

author: Richard Innes
title: Hard quiz alert! How quickly can you name the Champions League's 20 all-time top goalscorers?
text:
Don't get too excited - everyone else got these two as well… (Photo: Reuters) Share Get daily     
You can name all the Champions League's greatest goalscorers… right? 
If a player has scored enough Champions League goals to put him in the top 20 all-time list, you would be able to identify him straight away… right? 
Perhaps not. 
The quiz you can find below sounds very simple. All you have to do is name each of the 20 names at the top of the all-time Champions League goal list. We've even given you the nationality of each goalscorer and the number of goals he's scored in the competition. 
However, it's a lot trickier than it sounds. You will no doubt get get the guys in first and second place pretty quickly… (Photo: Angel Martinez) 
…but there are a few in there that are surprisingly tough. 
We've given you seven minutes to crack it. GO! Like us on Facebook
